title.rendered: CaliSmile Smile Makeover Goes Beyond Borders

content.rendered:
CaliSmile Orthodontics

CaliSmile Orthodontics Locations

CaliSmile Orthodontics Office

Searching for the most affordable and comprehensive payment options for orthodontic services? Look no further than CaliSmile Orthodontics.

At our office, the team strives toward an important goal: offering special orthodontic options in the most efficient and pleasant way possible. We believe you deserve nothing but the best experience.”

— Dr. Amir Dehghan

ENCINO, CA, UNITED STATES, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Searching for the most affordable and comprehensive payment options for orthodontic services? Look no further than CaliSmile Orthodontics.

We, at CaliSmile Orthodontics, are pleased to announce that we will be expanding our services throughout the state of California. From Encino to West Hills, and with the addition of Woodland Hills, Studio City, Van Nuys, Sherman Oaks, and Tarzana to our list of service areas, CaliSmile is now better equipped to assist more patients attain their dream smiles through our wide range of orthodontic services.

CaliSmile Orthodontics has been helping people all over Los Angeles County straighten their teeth for years. Our team of expert orthodontists, led by Dr. Amir Dehghan and his accompanying tagline, “A smile is a curve that sets everything straight”, has helped numerous patients improve their oral health and aesthetic tooth alignment. With our new space and expansion of the practice, we are excited to be able to share our knowledge and love of orthodontics with even more people who need and could benefit from it.

At CaliSmile, “We Make You Smile!” Dr. Dehghan, who has more than just 17 years of experience and is a skilled but person-centered orthodontist, will make sure you are relaxed while he and his team help transform a smile into a beautiful and healthy one.

CaliSmile recognizes the need for orthodontic treatment for children, teens, and adults and has extended its services to reach a wider audience. Our range of options, including metal braces, transparent braces, and Invisalign clear aligners, can address various dental needs. Our team of professionals is dedicated to assisting those seeking to improve their dental health or achieve straighter teeth.

How do we do this? To get the greatest outcomes, we collaborate closely with each patient to design a personal treatment plan that is tailored to every patient’s specific requirements. Dr. Dehghan will be there at every step, from the first meeting to the care afterward. We use the latest technology to offer a wide range of safe treatment options, as well as individual care and attention. “I am so happy I chose Dr. Dehghan. Both of my kids enjoy their checkups and have healthy smiles. I can’t thank you enough,” says a satisfied parent.

CaliSmile Orthodontics provides several options for orthodontic treatment, including Invisalign, metal, and transparent braces. Clear braces are a more discreet alternative to traditional metal braces since they employ brackets and wires that are either clear or the color of one’s teeth to straighten them. When it comes to straightening teeth and fixing crooked bites, both treatments that CaliSmile offers are equally successful.

What is the catch in the Invisalign treatment that CaliSmile offers? Invisalign’s transparent aligners are a top seller among orthodontic options nowadays. It’s a game-changer. In this cutting-edge method, teeth are progressively moved into place with the use of a set of removable, transparent aligners. Patients who want their teeth straightened but don’t want the inconvenience of conventional braces can consider Invisalign. We provide both children and adults with Invisalign to correct misaligned teeth. With this type of treatment, one may get the benefits of orthodontics, such as a straighter smile, without anybody recognizing that one is wearing braces.

All of our patients receive premier care since our orthodontic experts are well-versed in administering Invisalign and traditional braces. “At our office, the team strives toward an important goal: offering special orthodontic options in the most efficient and pleasant way possible. We believe you deserve nothing but the best experience,” Dr. Amir Dehghan and his superb team highlight. By tailoring each patient’s therapy with cutting-edge technology, we can guarantee the best potential outcomes in the shortest amount of time. CaliSmile Orthodontics provides with the highest quality Invisalign treatment available because of the team’s experience and dedication to patients’ happiness.

By choosing dental braces, the outcome of having straight teeth and healthy gums can be certain. Correcting dental issues can reduce the likelihood of developing cavities and gum disease. Straighter teeth can make the jaw, neck, and head line up better, which can give more confidence and make it easier to speak. The procedure for acquiring braces and wearing them has changed throughout the years as technology has advanced.

No matter the orthodontic treatment selected, Encino CaliSmile Orthodontics will provide the highest quality care. Our orthodontic staff places a premium on each individual’s sense of ease and trust in the process. We take the time to get to know each patient, address their worries, and provide them with the help they need to succeed because we understand that deciding to get braces or Invisalign is a major step.

CaliSmile provides comprehensive orthodontics services for all ages’ needs, specializing in braces and Invisalign treatments. Our current convenient and modern offices are in two locations: Encino and West Hills. “We are thrilled that you have chosen to embark on the journey of enhancing your appearance and confidence. Our goal is to ensure that your experience is both enjoyable and effective, resulting in a beautiful and healthy smile” CaliSmile Orthodontics team stated. CaliSmile believes that top-tier orthodontic care services should be accessible to Encino, Tarzana, and beyond. Another satisfied parent shared this review: “My daughter is not afraid of the dentist anymore, and her teeth are healthy and look absolutely beautiful!”

For information regarding orthodontic treatments and to schedule an appointment with our specialist, Dr. Amir Dehghan, please visit our website or call (310) 710-6527. If there are any inquiries about CaliSmile Orthodontics, we would be delighted to address them and assist you in achieving your desired smile.

Dr. Amir Dehghan
CaliSmile Orthodontics
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Instagram

News Provided By

April 13, 2023, 17:47 GMT
